meanings.definition: A plural form of the name Fabiola.
meanings.english_definition: Plural form of the given name Fabiola.

examples.sentence: There are many women named Fabiola, so we call them Fabiolas.
examples.translation: ファビオラという名前の女性はたくさんいるので、彼女らをファビオラスと呼びます。

etymology.value: Derived from the given name Fabiola.

usage_notes.explanation: This is simply the plural form of the name Fabiola. It is used when referring to multiple people named Fabiola.

readability_explanation.text: This word is simply the plural form of the name Fabiola.
